successes.title: The World's First HomePod
successes.description: Your content at home in any room. Surfaces become large screens, music follows you, wirelessly: the first genuine "home" computer.

Pledges.description: EVERY LITTLE HELPS! Sending you a BIG thank you from all the KEECKER team. We’ll keep you posted on all the KEECKER exclusive updates, availability and more.
BE A PART OF OUR REVOLUTION! As a friend of the KEECKER family, your name will be featured on the virtual wall of fame on our website.

TOGETHER, WE'LL MAKE KEECKER HAPPEN! As an exclusive KEECKER family member, your name will feature on the physical wall of fame at our Paris HQ. You’ll also receive an exclusive invitation for one of the official KEECKER launches (Travel not included) + rewards above!
PIMP YOUR RIDE! Access to our SDK and full documentation before anyone else for building the best apps ever that work with KEECKER.
KEECKER 1 on 1 - get all the above and join our CEO and team on a live preview demo online of our final product before anyone else, give your feedback, ideas and ask questions.
KEECKER PREMIER tester - get all the above, and be the first to try KEECKER remotely: you'll make it move in our office from your phone, talk to us and play with KEECKER remotely for 15 minutes.

SUPER EARLY BIRDS! Save an incredible $3000 off the retail price and receive a special Kickstarter edition! + rewards above
(Jump the queue to be first in line for delivery - Shipping not included)

EXTRA EARLY ADOPTER! Missed the early bird offers? Hurry and order your Kickstarter edition for just $2,490, saving $2500!  + rewards above
(Be second in line for delivery + Shipping not included)

OCT 17-19 WEEKEND SPECIAL OFFER! Thanks for your support, we are happy to offer you two extra days to get KEECKER at $2490 only! saving $2500! + rewards above
(Be second in line for delivery + Shipping not included)

EARLY BIRD! Missed the Extra Early adopter? Fear not, for here lies your chance to order a special Kickstarter edition for just $2,590, saving $2410! 
+ rewards above
(Be second in line for delivery - Shipping not included)

EARLY ADOPTER! You'll get a beautiful   KEECKER, and be the first to receive it. 
(Be first in line for delivery + Shipping not included)
DOUBLE KEECKER: get a 2 KEECKER bundle for your multiple stories home or just for the fun and an even larger screen and sound! (Be first in line for delivery- Shipping not included).
MORE DOUBLE KEECKER: get a 2 KEECKER bundle for your multiple stories home or just for the fun and an even larger screen and sound! (Be first in line for delivery- Shipping not included).
EVEN MORE DOUBLE KEECKER: get a 2 KEECKER bundle for your multiple stories home or just for the fun and an even larger screen and sound! (Be first in line for delivery- Shipping not included).

KEECKER ORIGINAL N°3! Receive a limited edition KEECKER, laser engraved with the team's signatures and N°3 stamp. Plus, get to grips with your KEECKER in no time via a private demo webinar from the KEECKER team! 
(Be first in line for delivery - Shipping not included)

KEECKER ORIGINAL N°2! Receive a limited edition KEECKER, laser engraved with the team's signatures and N°2 stamp. Plus, get to grips with your KEECKER in no time via a private demo webinar from the KEECKER team! 
(Be first in line for delivery - Shipping not included)

KEECKER COLLECTOR! Numero UNO baby! Receive a limited edition KEECKER, laser engraved with the team’s signatures and N°1 stamp. PLUS, visit us at your convenience at our Paris HQ for a private demo from the KEECKER team! 
( Be first in line for delivery- Shipping and travel not included).

CUSTOM KEECKER! Choose your own color or texture to create a totally unique and personal KEECKER to match your home and personality. It'll be signed by the entire team of course! (Shipping not included)

KEECKER ANGEL! Receive an exclusive invitation from our CEO for you and a friend to attend the official launch party. PLUS a private dinner with all the KEECKER team. PLUS have your KEECKER laser engraved with the signatures of the team. 
( Be first in line for delivery- Shipping and Travel not included)
